Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=3 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=2 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=10 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=16 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.31614561]Display cytotoxic against human gastric cells(N87 cell:IC50=1558 ± 324μM)
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Temporin-SHa and Its Analogs as Potential Candidates for the Treatment of Helicobacter pylori.
Literature.Author: Olleik H, Baydoun E, Perrier J, Hijazi A, Raymond J, Manzoni M, Dupuis L, Pauleau G, Goudard Y, Villéon B, Goin G, Sockeel P, Choudhary MI, Pasquale ED, Nadeem-Ul-Haque M, Ali H, Khan AI, Shaheen F, Maresca M.
